item.description:
There will be a guided tour at the Museum of Fine Arts on Wednesday, May 30 at 6:30PM for a mythic/symbolic exploration of the MFA's Egyptian Collection. We will meet in the NEW Sharf Visitor Center between the newly opened Fenway Entrance and the Rotundra on the first floor. We would like to begin at 6:45pm sharp so arrive a little early so we can all start the walking lecture together. It should last until about 8:45PM. There is no mandatory entrance fee on Wednesday evenings but a donation is suggested.

Please call Garrett, your tour guide, before 6:30PM on Wednesday if you have any questions or if you are running late. His cell phone number is 617-686-3353. We would appreciate it if you could please confirm your attendance so we can start once everyone arrives.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the new visitor center

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Egyptian Symbolism: a guided tour of the MFA
